localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: We can not share links when we are speaking in podcasts or clubhouse rooms. Hupu, creates numbers for your links and people who wants to reach, enter number to hupu app or webpage and reach links without sign-in.
blogPost.body: We can not share links when we are speaking in podcasts or clubhouse rooms. Hupu, creates numbers for your links and people who wants to reach, enter number to hupu app or webpage and reach links without sign-in.
blogPost.title: Hupu - Share a link with your audience via numbers
blogPost.author: Bahadır Kaya

localize.description: 我们在播客或会所房间发言时，不能分享链接。Hupu，为你的链接和想联系的人创建号码，输入号码到hupu应用或网页，无需登录就能联系到链接。
localize.tagline: 通过数字与您的受众分享链接

localize.description: 我們在播客或會所房間發言時，不能分享鏈接。Hupu，爲你的鏈接和想聯繫的人創建號碼，輸入號碼到hupu應用或網頁，無需登錄就能聯繫到鏈接。
localize.tagline: 通過數字與您的受衆分享鏈接

S&P 500指数今日暴跌+0.1%。

希望大家都能活下来

S&P 500指數今日暴跌+0.1%。

希望大家都能活下來

next.title: The CEO known for increasing his employees’ base annual pay to $70,000 says wealthy people donating and getting rewarded with “glowing articles, a hospital named after you and a massive tax write-off” amount to “one of capitalism’s biggest PR scams.” https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc

localize.full_text: 这位因将员工基本年薪提高到7万美元而闻名的CEO表示，富人捐款并获得 "光鲜亮丽的文章、以你名字命名的医院和大量的税收减免 "的奖励，相当于 "资本主义最大的公关骗局之一 "https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc。
這位因將員工基本年薪提高到7萬美元而聞名的CEO表示，富人捐款並獲得 "光鮮亮麗的文章、以你名字命名的醫院和大量的稅收減免 "的獎勵，相當於 "資本主義最大的公關騙局之一 "https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc。
